thread.section_title: Emeraude Hotel Plaza Etoile - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Right by the Arc
thread.title_full: Right by the Arc - Review of Emeraude Hotel Plaza Etoile, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: LupitaRC
title: Right by the Arc
text:
The location is perfect. Right by the Arc and Champs Elysee. The room is nice and spacious and very clean. They have free croissants so that is the best. The staff is really nice and they have late check in.
Room Tip: Get the room on the first floor by the check in. Very spacious. See more room tips
